Player History
Drafted in 43rd round, 688th overall pick, by Detroit in 2015...
Had first career hit on 4/2/2015, off Kevin Kunio (ATL)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/7/2015, off Jason Beebe (CIN)...

1/31/2017: Gets a new one-year contract worth $550,000 through salary arbitration...
1/31/2018: Gets a new one-year contract worth $550,000 through salary arbitration...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/22/2018, hitting .688 with 2 HR, 3 RBI...
1/31/2019: Gets a new one-year contract worth $550,000 through salary arbitration...
1/31/2020: Gets a new one-year contract worth $550,000 through salary arbitration...

Signed as a free agent by Detroit on 2/27/2021 to a 2-year deal worth $1,230,000 per year...
